attributes.action: Stop having to pay for childcare straight away but have instead a Government Loan to pay it back
attributes.additional_details:
The Government issues lots of loans for various schemes.  It does not however offer one for childcare.  The average cost of childcare is now over £100 a week.  For a child under three who are not eligible for a free 20 hour nursery place yet, it works out to be too expensive for a lot of families to work.  However if there is an interest free loan to pay back over 10 years.  It can be a lot cheaper for example:

If a parent goes back to work when the baby is six months.  The childcare cost up to 3 years would be on average £7800 (this is not including holiday).  However if there was a loan the cost per week would be £15 a week.
